name: Mejiro Dober (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Mejiro Dober (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.7~1.0

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • mejiro dober \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • white gloves, sleeveless shirt, white shirt, center frills, collared shirt, bare shoulders, belt, pleated skirt, green skirt, thigh strap, kneehighs, white socks, high heels

      • (optional) suspender

    • Camping costume :

      • sun hat, straw hat, barefoot, blue dress, sleeveless dress, bracelet , bare shoulders, collarbone, ears through headwear

    • Wedding costume :

      • Due to lack of image set, not included in LoRA. Maybe normal wedding dress is possible.

Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • Use highres.fix to get higher quality image

      • Upscaler : Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • trained on sd-scripts by kohya_ss. Thank you a lot!

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 114 images of mejiro dober

    • 4x low quality 36 images

    • 8x medium quality 39 images

    • 16x high quality 39 images

    • => 1 epoch = 1080 images

  • replaced character feature tags with mejiro dober \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, brown hair, purple eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 7 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
